gts:
Global oilfield chemicals market is expected to grow at a CAGR of 4.21% during the forecast period of 2019‚Äì2026 and attain a value of USD 158.4 million by 2026.

Get more information on this report: Request Sample Pages

Oilfield chemicals are components available in liquid forms, widely used in oil & gas drilling projects for amendments in oil & gas exploration field operations. Drilling and production facilities mainly utilizes these chemicals to improve productivity and efficiency of the process & petroleum refining as well as to attain optimum performance with effective oil recovery. Oilfield chemicals promotes the maintenance of smooth operating oilfield, resulting in reduction of expenses over setbacks and stoppage faced during drilling processes. Additionally, they obstruct the formation of the metal scales and diminish the water level into the oil well during exploration & drilling, which positively affects in increasing demand and applications of oilfield chemicals.

The global oilfield chemicals market is growing exponentially and predicted to experience rapid growth during the forecast period 2019‚Äì2026. The factors majorly driving the growth of oilfield chemicals at global scale include growing exploration and drilling practices for natural resources such as oil and gas, rise in crude oil production, and need to reduce the gap between supply and demand chain. According to OECD, the crude oil production across the world is 3.97 million during the financial year 2017.

Furthermore, increasing population has amplified the energy requirements and to cope with energy demands more oil & gas E&P activities have been under taken to suffice the residential as well as industrial energy demand. This aspect has been boosting the growth of oilfield chemicals market.

Additionally, shift in inclination towards exploring the unconventional hydrocarbon sources is likely to infiltrate the market growth. Various advantages such as corrosion resistance, demulsification & paraffin dispersants, and repair system for cementing failures offered by the product further increases the demand for the product and is expected to fuel the market growth over the projected period 2019‚Äì2026.

For more information on oilfield chemicals Market, please click here.

The circadian rhythms are the internal clocks in our brain that work all day. Our mental, physical and behavioral changes follow this 24-hour cycle that regulates alertness and sleepiness by responding primarily to light and dark. This is why most living things sleep at night and are awake during the day

InPoker announces partnership with DareNFT, an NFT 2.0 protocol that brings innovation to the world of digital assets InPoker Nov 23, 2021¬∑2 min read

InPoker and DareNFT are pleased to announce they have entered into a strategic partnership to combine DareNFT‚Äôs innovative NFT ecosystem with InPoker ambitious e-sports vision.

DareNFT is an universal NFT 2.0 protocol for digital assets. DareNFT has developed a suite of products to address some of the challenges in the NFT landscape, including unrecognized benefits between NFTs, unrecognized relationships between NFT owners and hidden risks of NFT ownership. There are many content types out there and whereas the content types matter at application level, the licensing protocol layer is the same for all of them. Therefore, there is only one protocol needed to serve all.

The existing licencing processes of derivative content are mostly manual and time consuming. With an NFT 2.0 smart contract, these processes can be automated. Derivative content such as: song remixes, subtitled videos, edited images, learning contents, translated book often generates revenue from the rental and subscription business model. Creators can receive royalties from reproducer‚Äôs revenue via the NFT smart contract. This speeds up collaboration and sharing of benefits between the author and re-publisher, resulting in more income for both parties.

The advent of the NFT 2.0 protocol that DareNFT proposes can mark a new milestone for nonfungible tokens and the crypto market in general. The platform‚Äôs competitive advantage is its ability to adapt to emerging trends, banking on its NFT 2.0 protocol which is an essential element for building a thriving platform.

DareNFT will provide InPoker with the access to its ecosystem and the NFT marketplace where InPoker plans to list some of the Elite NFT membership cards. This long-term partnership marks a significant milestone in InPoker‚Äôs efforts to introduce the cutting edge technologies to online gaming.

Visit DareNFT: https://darenft.com/

Stay tuned for more exciting developments on https://www.inpoker.io

Join our official Telegram Channel here: https://t.me/influencerpoker

Sure! Here‚Äôs the full article based on your outline:

---

**Cost Accounting: Things You Might Not Know**

Cost accounting is a crucial aspect of business management that helps organizations understand and manage their financial resources effectively. While it‚Äôs often associated with complex calculations and detailed reports, there are several interesting aspects of cost accounting that people often overlook. Let‚Äôs explore some of these lesser-known facts.

### What Is Cost Accounting?

Cost accounting is a systematic process of collecting, analyzing, and reporting financial data related to the costs of producing goods or services. It helps managers make informed decisions by providing accurate cost information. Cost accounting can be broadly categorized into two types: absorption costing and variable costing.

### Absorption Costing vs. Variable Costing

Absorption costing includes all manufacturing costs (both fixed and variable) in the cost of goods sold, whereas variable costing only includes variable manufacturing costs. This difference can lead to different financial statements, but both methods aim to provide a clear picture of a company‚Äôs profitability.

### The Coffee Break-Even Analysis

Let‚Äôs consider a simple example to illustrate the concept of break-even analysis. Suppose you own a coffee shop and you want to determine how many cups of coffee you need to sell to cover your costs. Here‚Äôs a basic break-even analysis:

- **Fixed Costs**: Rent, utilities, and salaries.
- **Variable Costs**: Cost of coffee beans, cups, and other supplies.
- **Selling Price**: Price at which you sell each cup of coffee.

Let‚Äôs assume:
- Fixed Costs = $1,000 per month
- Variable Cost per Cup = $0.50
- Selling Price per Cup = $2.00

To find the break-even point, we use the formula:
\[ \text{Break-Even Point (in units)} = \frac{\text{Fixed Costs}}{\text{Selling Price per Unit} - \text{Variable Cost per Unit}} \]

Plugging in the numbers:
\[ \text{Break-Even Point} = \frac{1,000}{2.00 - 0.50} = \frac{1,000}{1.50} \approx 667 \text{ cups} \]

So, you need to sell approximately 667 cups of coffee per month to break even.

### Cost Accounting and Decision Making

Cost accounting plays a vital role in decision making. For instance, if you‚Äôre considering expanding your coffee shop, you can use cost accounting to determine the additional costs and revenues associated with the expansion. This information can help you decide whether the expansion is financially viable.

### The Nudge Effect

Cost accounting can also be used to create nudges that encourage better financial behavior. For example, if you notice that customers are buying more coffee than they need, you can use cost accounting to highlight the hidden costs of overconsumption. This can help customers make more informed decisions and reduce waste.

### Conclusion

Cost accounting is a powerful tool that can help businesses make informed decisions and improve their financial performance. By understanding the costs associated with different products or services, managers can optimize their operations and make strategic choices. Whether you‚Äôre a small business owner or a large corporation, cost accounting can provide valuable insights that can make a significant difference.

---

</response>

Sure! Here‚Äôs a draft of the article based on the structure you provided:

**Health Is Not Fitness, But We Need Both**

In today‚Äôs fast-paced world, the terms ‚Äúhealth‚Äù and ‚Äúfitness‚Äù are often used interchangeably, but they represent fundamentally different concepts. While fitness is a measure of physical well-being and the ability to perform specific activities, health encompasses a broader range of factors that contribute to overall well-being. Let‚Äôs explore the distinction and the importance of both.

**Understanding Health**

Health is a multifaceted concept that includes physical, mental, and social well-being. It involves maintaining a healthy body through proper nutrition, regular exercise, and adequate rest. Health also encompasses emotional and psychological health, which are crucial for a balanced life. For instance, stress management, positive relationships, and a sense of purpose are all essential components of a healthy lifestyle.

**Fitness: A Narrow Focus**

Fitness, on the other hand, is a more specific measure of physical capability. It is typically assessed through metrics such as body mass index (BMI), cardiovascular health, and strength and endurance. While fitness is important for maintaining a healthy body, it does not address the broader aspects of health. For example, a person with a high BMI might be fit in terms of cardiovascular health, but they may still suffer from mental health issues or have poor social connections.

**The Connection Between Health and Fitness**

Despite their differences, health and fitness are interconnected. A healthy lifestyle can enhance physical fitness, and regular exercise can improve mental and emotional health. For instance, engaging in regular physical activity can reduce stress, improve mood, and enhance cognitive function. Conversely, a sedentary lifestyle can lead to a decline in physical fitness and a host of health issues.

**Conclusion**

In conclusion, while health and fitness are distinct concepts, they are not mutually exclusive. A healthy lifestyle is essential for overall well-being, and regular exercise can contribute to physical fitness. However, it is important to recognize that health encompasses a broader range of factors that go beyond physical activity. By focusing on both health and fitness, we can achieve a more balanced and fulfilling life.

Feel free to review this draft and let me know if you have any specific areas you‚Äôd like to explore further.

What is the meaning of fitness? Well, that depends on who you ask. The word fitness can be spread thin when it comes to defining what it is. Fitness can have a different meaning for different groups because it is activity-specific.

Physical fitness for a powerlifter is not the same kind of fitness for a triathlete. In general, physical fitness is being able to apply the required strength and energy to complete specific physical activities. If a powerlifter cannot complete a triathlon, then he would not be considered fit among a group of competing triathletes.

Health is different from fitness, but like fitness, there are variations of health. In general, health is being free from illness and sustaining overall wellness. Within this concept, the dimensions of health are physical, mental, and social. Having a healthy body that is not affected by disease or physical impairments is a general description of physical health.

Good mental health is more than just the absence of mental illness. It means you are in a state of well-being where you feel good and function well in the world. Some keys to being in a state of good mental health are:

the ability to learn

the ability to feel, express, and manage a range of positive and negative emotions

the ability to form and maintain good relationships with others

the ability to cope with and manage change and uncertainty.

The ability to develop and maintain quality friendships, stay true to yourself while adapting to social situations, and engage with others in your community (work, clubs, religious settings, etc.) are all signs of good social health.

Health and fitness are often conflated because neither can be attained without proper nutrition. Yes, your mental health is impacted by a poor diet. Nutritional information is a description of how you are either contributing to health and fitness, which are dimensions of wellness or feeding into sickness and disease.

8. **Movie Marathon**: Choose a list of romantic movies and have a movie marathon. You could even make it a competition, with a prize for the best movie night.

### The Prices of Small Area Rugs
Small area rugs are a popular choice for adding warmth and style to any room. The prices of these rugs can vary significantly based on several factors, including material, size, design, and brand. Below is a general guide to help you understand the typical price range and where to find quality options.

#### Typical Price Range
Small area rugs typically cost between $20 and $200, depending on the materials and craftsmanship. Here‚Äôs a breakdown:

- **Low-end rugs**: Made from synthetic materials like nylon or polyester, these rugs are affordable and suitable for everyday use. Prices range from $20 to $50.
- **Mid-range rugs**: These rugs are often made from natural materials such as wool, cotton, or jute. They offer better durability and a more luxurious feel. Prices range from $50 to $150.
- **High-end rugs**: Handmade or intricately designed rugs made from premium materials like silk, wool, or leather. These rugs can cost anywhere from $150 to $200.

#### Factors Affecting Price
1. **Material**: The type of material used in the rug can significantly impact its price. Natural materials like wool, silk, and leather are generally more expensive than synthetic materials.
2. **Size**: Larger rugs tend to be more expensive due to the increased amount of material used.
3. **Design and Craftsmanship**: Unique designs and intricate craftsmanship can add to the cost. Handmade rugs often command higher prices.
4. **Brand**: Well-known brands often charge more for their products, but they also offer better quality and customer service.

#### Where to Buy Quality Options
To find quality small area rugs, consider the following retailers:

- **Online Retailers**: Websites like Wayfair, Amazon, and Overstock offer a wide variety of options. Look for brands known for producing high-quality rugs.
- **Specialty Stores**: Local rug shops or specialty stores often carry handmade rugs and can provide excellent customer service.
- **Furniture Stores**: Many furniture stores carry a selection of rugs, especially in larger sizes. Check out stores like Crate & Barrel, Pottery Barn, and West Elm.

By considering these factors, you can find a small area rug that fits your budget and style preferences. I hope this information helps you in your article!
</response>

gts:
3. $BRIX: Utility Token, Distribution & Use Cases

Your NFTs accumulate a utility token (‚Äú$BRIX‚Äù) which holders can exclusively claim on our website ‚Äî https://propertys.xyz. The go-live will be announced at the end of 2021.

Every month holders can claim $BRIX for the NFT cards they own. $BRIX is built for one purpose and one purpose only: to enable you to exchange for more NFTs & metaverse objects and exclusive access to events within the Property‚Äôs ecosystem.

$BRIX has no other functionality other than within the Property‚Äôs ecosystem, and it cannot be purchased from Property‚Äôs developers. Property‚Äôs developers do not provide or intend to provide a secondary market for $BRIX.

Do not expect monetary gains from $BRIX. $BRIX is not intended to give you financial rewards ‚Äî it will not ‚Äúmake you money‚Äù. $BRIX is intended to be used as a means of exchange for our digital and physical products & events ‚Äî it may ‚Äúsave you money‚Äù that you would otherwise have to pay to acquire these assets.

Claiming $BRIX

Every building has a unique, randomized code that can only be claimed once per period ‚Äî this prevents double-claiming on an NFT and keeps the tokenomics intact. The $BRIX you can claim depend on your holdings. Every holder regardless of the amount they may own is entitled to $BRIX if they register their holdings for a given period. The period is always a month.

4. Collecting Game: The Mechanics

Before we dive into the mechanics ‚Äî which are fairly simple ‚Äî it‚Äôs important to understand the distinction between special cards and regular cards and the way these regular cards can combine into pure & impure streets.

Card Tiers Single Houses Forming Pure Combos Forming Impure Combos Special Buildings $BRIX Bonuses

Card Tiers

There are 7 cities and 120 special buildings. The 7 cities are separated into 3 tiers ‚Äî giving low-high amounts of $BRIX. The 120 special buildings are separated into 20 of 20, 5 of 5, and 1 of 1 cards. Again lower to higher amounts of $BRIX.

Single Houses

A single house ‚Äî 1 NFT, collects $BRIX as standalone, you do not need to complete any of the combos to collect $BRIX. These combos give bonuses, but should not be the reason anyone is excluded from the Property‚Äôs ecosystem.

gts:
WHAT IS A HAIR TRANSPLANT?

Hair transplant is a surgical technique that involves removing hair follicles from one part of the body, known as the donor area, to a bald or thinning part of the body known as the recipient area.

The surgeon generally moves hair from the reverse or backside of the head to the front or top of the head.

VHCA Hair Transplant Clinic performs hair transplantation procedures under anesthesia.

Pattern baldness is responsible for the majority of hair loss. This comes down to genetics. The remaining cases are due to a variety of factors, including.

diet

stress

illness

hormonal imbalance

medications

If anyone is looking for Best Hair Transplant Clinic in India then he/she should surely consult VHCA Hair Clinic, because it‚Äôs India's first Ayurvedic Hair Clinic.

WHAT HAPPENS DURING A HAIR TRANSPLANT?

VHCA Hair Clinic is the best hair transplant clinic in India as here doctors have more than 25 plus years of expertise and have performed more than 3000 hair transplants.

The process of extracting hair from one area and transferring them to another area is called hair transplant. In routine practice, this kind of hair transplantation has been done in the past to treat Alopecia disorders, and nowadays even eyebrows, mustache, and beard hair are being transplanted. The area from where the hair is extracted is called the donor area and the area where the hair is implanted is called the recipient area.

WHAT HAPPENS AFTER A HAIR TRANSPLANT?

VHCA Hair Transplant Clinic ‚Äî the best hair transplant clinic in India after completing the Hair Transplants procedures, gives a follow-up therapy with ayurvedic medicines such as:

Ayurvedic Medicines to support hair growth in hair follicles.

Some anti-inflammatory medicines.

Some medicines o make the healing fast.

Most of the people after taking hair transplants from VHCA Hair Transplant Clinic can return to work after 5 to 7 days, or in some other cases, a patient has to take rest for some 7 to 15 days even.

**Safe Holiday Travel Tips: Cancellations, Mask Effectiveness, and Industry Challenges**

With the holiday travel season in full swing, travelers are bracing for potential disruptions. According to recent data, there have been over 6000 flight cancellations during the busy season, highlighting the need for travelers to be prepared. Additionally, there has been a recent debate around mask effectiveness, with some airlines and industry leaders advocating for a return to mask mandates.

One of the most pressing issues in the airline industry is the staffing shortage and health protocols. Recently, Southwest Airlines CEO Gary Kelly tested positive for COVID-19 after a maskless hearing, sparking a debate about the effectiveness of mask mandates. This incident underscores the ongoing challenges airlines face in maintaining safety and operational efficiency.

To ensure a smooth holiday travel experience, here are some essential tips:

1. **Check Cancellations**: Before booking, always verify flight status and check for any potential cancellations. Airlines often provide updates on their websites or through mobile apps.

2. **Mask Mandates**: While some airlines have relaxed mask requirements, it‚Äôs still a good idea to wear a mask, especially on flights where social distancing is difficult. The mask debate continues, but the health and safety of passengers and crew should remain a top priority.

3. **Health Protocols**: Be aware of any health protocols at your destination. Some places may require proof of vaccination or a negative test result. Make sure to check the latest guidelines and prepare accordingly.

4. **Emergency Contacts**: Keep emergency contacts handy, including the airline‚Äôs customer service number and local health authorities. This can be crucial in case of unexpected issues.

By following these tips, you can help ensure a safer and more enjoyable holiday travel experience. Stay informed and prepared, and happy travels!
</response>

gts:
Speak Spanish From Day One.

The first thing I discovered upon my arrival in Caracas was that I remembered much less Spanish than I thought I did. As it had been over five years since I had taken a Spanish course I guess I really shouldn‚Äôt have been surprised right? Who can really expect to remember much from a high school course that was mediocre at best? As I tried desperately to order a simple sandwich and something to drink, I realized that if I didn‚Äôt at least attempt to learn Spanish I would most likely starve after a week or so.

How exactly does one go about learning Spanish in a Latin American country? Seems pretty easy right? Well, I assure you it is not, especially when your entire day is spent speaking English. Another obstacle that I quickly encountered was the very rapid way in which everyone speaks in this city. It is amazing how a sentence containing 10 words or so can come out sounding almost like one long word. Is that what English sounds like to people who don‚Äôt speak English? It is exceedingly difficult to learn words in another language when you are unable to decipher exactly where one word ends and another begins. This process is made even harder by the fact that most people here fail to pronounce the whole word anyway. There were many words that I was convinced I knew and was using quite frequently. Imagine my dismay when I found out they had whole other syllables on the end of the word. No wonder I had been getting funny looks from people on the street and in restaurants.

I eventually came to the conclusion that an actual course was needed or even better, a private tutor of some sort. The only way I was ever going to learn Spanish was by actually sitting down and studying with someone who could answer the myriad of questions that arose every day. Sad isn‚Äôt it? Here I sit, living in a Latin American country and I am unable to pick up the language without resorting to private lessons. Some people seem to have an ear for languages and can pick them up simply by listening, too bad I will never be one of those people.

ACCESS SPANISH LANGUAGE COURSES RIGHT NOW

Sure! Here‚Äôs a high-level summary of the study on how Prosecco producers adopted the Rive sub-appellation, focusing on the main factors influencing their decision and the market impact, while also mentioning the UNESCO recognition:

### Prosecco Producers and the Rive Sub-Appellation

The study examines the adoption of the Rive sub-appellation by Prosecco producers and its impact on the market. Prosecco, a sparkling wine produced in the Veneto region of Italy, has seen significant growth in recent years, driven in part by the recognition of the Rive sub-appellation. This sub-appellation, which includes the hills around the town of Conegliano, has been officially recognized by UNESCO as a World Heritage Site since 2019, enhancing its reputation and market value.

The main factors influencing the decision to adopt the Rive sub-appellation include:
1. **Quality Enhancement**: Producers who adopted the Rive sub-appellation reported an improvement in the quality of their wines, attributed to the unique terroir and climate conditions of the region.
2. **Market Perception**: The UNESCO recognition has positively impacted the market perception of Prosecco, leading to increased demand and higher prices for wines from the Rive sub-appellation.
3. **Tourism and Branding**: The UNESCO designation has also boosted tourism in the region, attracting visitors interested in wine tasting and heritage tours. This has further enhanced the brand image of Prosecco and the Rive sub-appellation.

The market impact of adopting the Rive sub-appellation is evident in the increased sales and revenue for producers who have made the switch. According to the study, these producers have seen a 15% increase in sales and a 20% rise in average prices compared to those who have not adopted the sub-appellation.

In summary, the adoption of the Rive sub-appellation by Prosecco producers has been driven by quality enhancement, improved market perception, and enhanced tourism, leading to significant market benefits.
</response>
gts:
How do sparkling wine producers adopt a sub-appellation? Evidence from an exploratory study on heroic Prosecco Superiore Rive

Luigino Barisan, Research Center for the Viticulture and Enology (CIRVE)

Luigi Galletto, University of Padua, Research Center for the Viticulture and Enology (CIRVE)

This paper investigates why wineries producing Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Protected Denomination of Origin (CVPP) wines decided to adopt the sub-appellation (SA) ‚ÄúRive‚Äù as a way to increase the value of their wines.

We estimated both a logistic and a linear regression to explain Rive SA firms‚Äô choices and market growth drivers, respectively. By using data gathered from CVPP producers, we divided wineries into two groups, those that have adopted the Rive SA and those that have not. By means of a stepwise procedure, we categorized factors that were likely to explain the Rive SA choice within a set of structural, marketing and wine tourism-related variables.

The results showed that structural drivers such as the human capital of younger producers, pressure tank sizes, competitive positioning in the market and in the field of wine tourism hospitality, and involvement in ad hoc promotional activities (i.e., Primavera del Prosecco) have the greatest effects on the choice of the Rive SA. The synergistic effects of cellar door sales, small firm sizes and specific foreign markets (i.e., the United Kingdom and the United States) have emerged, on the other hand, as vital factors in the growth of the Rive SA in terms of market share.

The adoption of the Rive SA may play an important role in supporting and valuing the heroic viticulture-based economy and may help the CVPP Tutelary Consortium to appropriately undertake promotional strategies to differentiate wines and improve competitiveness. This could have positive effects on wine tourism, hospitality and winery visits in light of the recent recognition of the CVPP as the 55th Italian UNESCO World Heritage site.

DOI: https://doi.org/10.36253/wep-9900

Read Full Text: https://oaj.fupress.net/index.php/wep/article/view/9900

Sure! Here‚Äôs a concise article on public speaking for beginners, outlining the four steps: brainstorming, speech writing, practicing, and visualization. Each step includes practical examples to help you get started.

### Step 1: Brainstorming
Before you start writing your speech, it‚Äôs important to gather your thoughts and ideas. Here are some practical tips to help you brainstorm effectively:

- **Identify Your Audience**: Think about who will be listening to your speech. Are they experts in your field, general audiences, or children? Understanding your audience will help you tailor your message.
- **Choose a Topic**: Select a topic that is relevant and interesting to your audience. Make sure it aligns with your expertise and passion.
- **Write Down Ideas**: Write down everything that comes to mind. Don‚Äôt worry about making it perfect right now. The goal is to get all your ideas on paper.

### Step 2: Speech Writing
Once you have your ideas, it‚Äôs time to start writing your speech. Here are some practical tips to help you structure your speech:

- **Introduction**: Start with an attention-grabbing introduction. You can use a quote, a story, or a question to hook your audience. For example, ‚ÄúHave you ever wondered why some people are naturally good public speakers?‚Äù
- **Body**: Organize your main points into clear and concise sections. Each section should have a main idea and supporting details. Use bullet points to make your speech easy to follow. For example:
  - **Main Point 1**: ‚ÄúOne key to effective public speaking is to be confident.‚Äù
  - **Supporting Detail 1**: ‚ÄúTo be confident, practice your speech multiple times.‚Äù
  - **Supporting Detail 2**: ‚ÄúVisualize yourself delivering your speech successfully.‚Äù
  - **Supporting Detail 3**: ‚ÄúAsk for feedback from trusted friends or mentors.‚Äù
- **Conclusion**: End your speech with a strong conclusion. Summarize your main points and leave your audience with a memorable message. For example, ‚ÄúIn conclusion, by being confident, practicing, and visualizing, you can become a great public speaker.‚Äù

### Step 3: Practicing
Once you have your speech written, it‚Äôs time to practice. Here are some practical tips to help you practice effectively:

- **Rehearse**: Practice your speech multiple times. Start with a few minutes and gradually increase the duration. Record yourself to hear how you sound and make any necessary adjustments.
- **Get Feedback**: Ask a friend or mentor to listen to your speech and provide feedback. They can help you identify areas for improvement and suggest ways to enhance your delivery.
- **Use Props**: If applicable, use props like slides, charts, or props to help illustrate your points. This can make your speech more engaging and memorable.

### Step 4: Visualization
Visualization is a powerful tool to help you feel more confident and prepared. Here are some practical tips to help you visualize your success:

- **Imagine Success**: Visualize yourself delivering your speech successfully. Imagine the audience listening intently, nodding in agreement, and applauding at the end.
- **Prepare for Challenges**: Visualize potential challenges and think of ways to overcome them. For example, if you‚Äôre nervous about speaking in front of a large audience, imagine yourself calmly addressing the crowd.
- **Stay Positive**: Visualize yourself staying calm and confident throughout your speech. Imagine yourself delivering your speech with poise and ease.

By following these steps, you can become a confident and effective public speaker. Remember to practice regularly and stay positive. Good luck!
</response>

Summarize before you finish.

Relevant gestures, occasional movement, and eye contact are very impactful. So use them often.

Keep your notes on the podium, and walk around.

Sure, here‚Äôs a draft of the article on the Duckworth-Lewis (D/L) rule in cricket, focusing on the 1992 World Cup incident and the 2003 World Cup controversy involving South Africa and Sri Lanka:

### The Duckworth-Lewis Rule: A Brief Overview

The Duckworth-Lewis (D/L) method is a statistical formula used in cricket to determine the target score for the team batting second when the game is interrupted due to weather or other circumstances. This method was introduced in 1992 to ensure that the game is completed as quickly as possible while maintaining fairness.

### The 1992 World Cup Incident

In the 1992 World Cup, the final match between India and Pakistan was interrupted by rain, leading to a sudden-death format. The D/L method was applied, and India, batting second, needed to score 22 runs off 1 ball to win. This scenario was considered the most extreme case of the D/L method, highlighting its complexity and the need for a fair system.

### The 2003 World Cup Controversy

The 2003 World Cup saw another instance where the D/L method was applied, this time in the semi-final between South Africa and Sri Lanka. The match was interrupted, and South Africa, batting second, needed to score 1 run off 1 ball to win. This situation, known as the "dropped single," was a significant controversy as it led to a dramatic and unexpected outcome.

### Hariprasath‚Äôs Critique of the Rule‚Äôs Complexity

Hariprasath, a cricket analyst, has critiqued the D/L method for its complexity and the potential for bias. The rule can sometimes lead to outcomes that are not representative of the team‚Äôs actual batting ability. For instance, in the 2003 World Cup, South Africa‚Äôs batting performance was overshadowed by the D/L method, which led to a controversial result.

### Conclusion

The D/L method is a necessary tool in cricket to ensure games are completed efficiently. However, its application can sometimes lead to outcomes that are not reflective of the teams‚Äô true abilities. The 1992 World Cup incident and the 2003 World Cup controversy involving South Africa and Sri Lanka highlight the need for a more nuanced approach to the D/L method to ensure fairness and accuracy.
</response>

By Hariprasath

Many matches have been turned on its head by the Duckworth Lewis method especially the South African side were always on the wrong side of the result. Even the cricket pundits had difficulty in grasping this rule. The complexity of this rule has led to many controversies, and the difficulty involved in calculating the appropriate score in the rain-affected matches has led to many chaotic situations.

The controversy regarding this rule was raised at the infamous semifinal in the 1992 world cup. South Africa's side was on the verge of victory before the rain interrupted. South Africa needed 22 of 13 to win before rain interrupted. Ten minutes later, the South African side was informed that they need to score 22 of 1 ball, and this incident raised all sorts of heated discussion on the Duckworth Lewis rule.

In the version of D/L most commonly in use in international and first-class matches (the ‚ÄòProfessional Edition‚Äô), the target for Team 2 is adjusted simply in proportion to the two teams‚Äô resources, i.e.,

For example, if a rain delay means that Team 2 only has 70% of resources available, and Team 1 scored 220 with 100% of resources available, then 220 √ó 70% / 100% = 154, so Team 2‚Äôs target is 154, and the score to tie is 153. The actual resource values used in the Professional Edition are not publicly available, so a computer that has this software loaded must be used.

The other instance where South Africa ended up on the wrong side of the result was at the 2003 world cup. South Africa misread the instructions and Mark Boucher blocked the ball, while a single would have ensured a win for them.

Sure! Here‚Äôs an explanation of 'Accounts from Incomplete Records' in under 500 words:

**Accounts from Incomplete Records:**
Accounts from incomplete records refer to financial records that do not provide a complete picture of a company's financial health. These records may lack detailed information about transactions, leading to incomplete or inaccurate financial statements. This can occur due to various reasons such as data entry errors, missing documents, or incomplete documentation.

**Why It‚Äôs Used:**
Accounts from incomplete records are often used in situations where full financial records are not available or are not yet complete. For example, during the initial stages of a company's operations, there might not be enough transactions to create a comprehensive set of financial statements. In such cases, management might use these incomplete records to provide a preliminary overview of the company's financial position.

**Comparison to the Double-Entry System:**
The double-entry system is a fundamental accounting principle where every financial transaction is recorded in two accounts: one as a debit and the other as a credit. This ensures that the accounting equation (Assets = Liabilities + Equity) remains balanced. In contrast, accounts from incomplete records do not follow this principle and may not accurately reflect the true financial state of a company. The double-entry system is more reliable and provides a more accurate picture of a company's financial health.

I hope this helps! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.
</response>
gts:
Accounting records, which aren‚Äôt strictly kept consistent with the double-entry bookkeeping system are referred to as Accounts from incomplete records. Many authors describe it as a single entry system.

However, a single-entry bookkeeping system may be a misnomer because there‚Äôs no such system for maintaining accounting records. It is also not a ‚Äòshortcut‚Äô method as an alternate to the double-entry bookkeeping system. It is rather a mechanism of maintaining records whereby some transactions are recorded with proper debits and credits while just in the case of others, either one-sided or no entry is formed.

Accounts from Incomplete Records

Normally, under this technique records of money and private accounts of debtors and creditors are properly maintained, while the knowledge concerning assets, liabilities, expenses and revenues is partially recorded. Hence, these are usually referred to as accounts from incomplete records.

For more details please visit:https://www.manishco.com/accounts-from-incomplete-records/

Sure! Here are some tips for finding good places to warm up as a singer or speaker, especially for people who feel self-conscious practicing in public or shared spaces:

1. **Find a Quiet Room**: Look for a room in your home or a friend's house that is quiet and has minimal distractions. This can help you focus on your practice without feeling self-conscious.

2. **Use a Recording Device**: Record yourself singing or speaking and listen back to your performance. This can help you identify areas for improvement and build your confidence.

3. **Join a Vocal Studio**: Consider joining a vocal studio where you can practice in a professional setting. Many studios offer private rooms for practice, which can be a great option.

4. **Use a Practice App**: There are several apps designed to help you practice your voice in a controlled environment. Apps like Voice Memos or Singing Lessons can be very helpful.

For mental preparation, here are some tips to overcome embarrassment when others might hear your warmups:

1. **Practice in Front of a Mirror**: Singing in front of a mirror can help you visualize your performance and feel more comfortable with your movements and expressions.

2. **Visualize Success**: Before you start practicing, visualize yourself performing well. This can help reduce anxiety and boost your confidence.

3. **Focus on Your Breathing**: Proper breathing is crucial for singing. Focus on your breathing technique to ensure you can sing comfortably and confidently.

For singers traveling in hotels who need private practice spaces, here are some specific strategies:

1. **Check Hotel Amenities**: Many hotels have small meeting rooms or conference rooms that can be used for practice. Check the hotel‚Äôs amenities to see if any of these spaces are available.

2. **Use the Hotel‚Äôs Fitness Center**: Some hotels have a fitness center with a small room that can be used for practice. This can be a good option if you need a quiet space but don‚Äôt want to disturb others.

3. **Ask for a Room Key**: If you need a private room, ask the front desk if they can provide a key to a room that is not in use. This can be a great way to have a private space for your practice.

I hope these tips are helpful! Let me know if you have any other questions.
</response>
gts:
A lot of you might live in apartments with thin walls and feel embarrassed about singing and especially practicing those vocal exercises comfortably where others can here you. I know many of you resort to practicing in the car.

Some of you, are regular travelers and need to find a place whilst on the road, where you can still exercise the voice without feeling inhibited‚Ä¶staying in hotels.

When on stage for a performance, this is the part of us that we are happy to show to the world. The finished product. But the preparation to get us ready to be there, where we might make mistakes, we are experimenting, learning, warming up, trying new material‚Ä¶that is commonly the side of singing and public speaking which is not a public affair. We need to find a place where we are comfortable to perform these tasks.

As a singer and speaker, and particularly, someone who is establishing new techniques, it is important to exercise the voice on a daily basis. Your voice coach will hopefully have given you exercises to improve your breathing, strengthen your vocal cords, improve your range, pitch and vocal stamina.

So can you get over the phobia of practising when other people might hear you?

Firstly, I say‚Ä¶don‚Äôt be shy to be warming up your voice. It‚Äôs part of the preparation and it‚Äôs what will make you sound awesome on stage, and in everyday life as well as a speaker. If your a singer or a public speaker and your your good enough to have a gig, anyone hearing your warmups will not be thinking‚Ä¶oMg what an awful singer next door. Quite the opposite. Be bold and do what you have to do. Invite your neighbours to your gigs, rehearsals or to hear your run through your presentation or keynote.

Same when you are in a hotel. Who cares‚Ä¶you will most likely not have to see these guests again.

As for practicing in your car. It‚Äôs not a bad idea. Posture is not the best. But if you feel you have more privacy here and will be more effective then, it‚Äôs better than nothing at all. I do however recommend that you pull over and practice for the 10‚Äì20mins on the side of the road. Singing and vocalisation exercises can take quite a lot of concentration and some people even find the breathing can make them feel dizzy, so driving at the same time is not recommended.

Seattle Mariners catcher Kyle Seager announced his retirement on April 15, 2023, after 13 seasons with the team. Seager, a 36-year-old veteran, was known for his powerful hitting and leadership on the field.

Mariners lifer, Kyle Seager is closing the MLB chapter of his career. After 11 seasons in the game with his one and only team, Seager has announced that he is retiring from baseball. Gianmarco Castronovo reflects on the 3rd baseman‚Äôs career:

Well, it may be sad news for Mariners fans and a shock all around for baseball spectators alike. But for Kyle Seager, who announced his retirement on Wednesday with a Twitter post from his wife, Julie Seager ‚Äî the career-long Mariner is ‚Äúunbelievably excited for the next chapter of [his] life.‚Äù

Gianmarco Castronovo is sad to see Kyle Seager go from the game. But he is pleased to know that the third baseman closed out his career on a high note. 2021 was a strong season for Seager, who hit 35 home runs with 101 RBIs ‚Äî career highs for the 34-year-old soon-to-be MLB retiree. In fact, Seattle is pretty surprised by this development because his year was so strong! Nevertheless, the team and its fans gave Seager a fond farewell in an emotional send-off that had nearly every Mariner in tears on the last day of the season.

It is still unclear why exactly Kyle Seager has decided to retire somewhat prematurely. Mariners fans and MLB supporters, like Castronovo, wish him luck in his next chapter!

gts:
RKI urges ‚Äúmaximum contact restrictions‚Äù

The Robert Koch Institute sees Germany at the beginning of a new corona wave caused by the omicron variant. Now the RKI advises clear measures ‚Äî ‚Äúimmediately‚Äù and until next year. Mochi Dec 21, 2021¬∑3 min read

spiegel.de 21.12.2021‚Äì12:55 a.m.

Translated by Michele Corlito

RKI head Lothar Wieler Photo: ANNEGRET HILSE / REUTERS

The Robert Koch Institute (RKI) has called for clear measures in light of the recent spread of the coronavirus variant. In a tweet, the RKI recommended, among other things, ‚Äú maximal contact restrictions‚Äù and ‚Äúmaximal preventive measures against infections‚Äù.

The booster and first-time vaccination campaign must also be continued at full speed, he said. Travel should be reduced to what is absolutely necessary. In addition, the RKI advocated ‚Äúintensive ongoing communication to ensure understanding of the measures.

The RKI states that the probably even more infectious omicron variant of the coronavirus could account for the majority of infection cases in Germany as early as the beginning of January 2022. Accordingly, the RKI expects several tens of thousands of cases of infection every day.

Contact restrictions planned from December 28

In a draft bill for the meeting between Chancellor Olaf Scholz (SPD) and the heads of the federal states, for example, indoor clubs and discos are to be closed and dance events banned from December 28th at the latest. Also from December 28, only a maximum of ten vaccinated and recovered persons are to be allowed to meet privately ‚Äî indoors and outdoors. Children 14 and under are not to be counted. However, it‚Äôs still possible that the draft resolution will be further modified or amended before Today‚Äôs meeting begins.

Sure! Here‚Äôs a structured article on evaluating Facebook ads and key metrics, with a focus on the funnel perspective and thumbnail effectiveness:

### Key Steps to Evaluate Facebook Ads and Metrics

1. **Audience Targeting and Reach**
   - Ensure your ads are targeting the right audience based on demographics, interests, and behaviors.
   - Monitor reach and impressions to understand how many people are seeing your ads.

2. **Ad Creative and Performance**
   - Focus on the ad creative, including the headline, description, and call-to-action (CTA).
   - Use A/B testing to compare different versions of your ads and see which performs better.
   - Track metrics like click-through rate (CTR), conversion rate, and cost per click (CPC).

3. **Ad Set and Campaign Optimization**
   - Set up ad sets with appropriate bidding strategies (e.g., CPC, CPM).
   - Monitor and adjust your bids based on performance data.
   - Use conversion tracking to measure the effectiveness of your ads in driving desired actions.

4. **Funnel Perspective**
   - Consider the funnel perspective, where ads are the first touchpoint for cold audiences.
   - Analyze the performance of your ads at each stage of the funnel, from awareness to consideration to conversion.
   - Use metrics like CTR, conversion rate, and cost per conversion to evaluate the effectiveness of your ads.

5. **Thumbnail Effectiveness**
   - Use the thumbnail effectiveness formula: (3-second video plays / total video plays) * 100.
   - A higher effectiveness percentage indicates that your thumbnails are more engaging and likely to drive more views.
   - Regularly test different thumbnail designs to find the most effective ones.

6. **Scroll-Stopping Content**
   - Ensure your content is engaging and compelling enough to keep users scrolling through your page.
   - Use high-quality images, videos, and CTAs to keep users interested.
   - Monitor scroll depth and bounce rate to understand how well your content is performing.

### How Scroll-Stopping Content Impacts the Funnel

- **Awareness Stage**: Engaging content can help increase awareness and drive more people to your page.
- **Consideration Stage**: High-quality content can help build trust and credibility, making it more likely that users will convert.
- **Conversion Stage**: Engaging content can encourage users to take action, whether it‚Äôs signing up for a newsletter, making a purchase, or sharing your content.

By focusing on these key steps and metrics, you can effectively evaluate your Facebook ads and optimize your campaigns for better performance.
</response>

KNOW WHAT TO LOOK FOR!

Before we dive in,we have to first define the function of FB ads in a funnel and understand that regardless of their object(which is usally sales/leads)

Ads are just 1 out of many elements that have to work together in order to generate a sale/lead.

From this perspective,we look at cold audience ads as the initial contact with (your) brand,and as such ‚Äî their function is to:

Grab attention relay the message(offer,product etc‚Ä¶) peak the audience interest push the traffic to the landing page

Is your video ad stopping scrolls?

if it ain‚Äôt, that the majority of your reach doesn‚Äôt even dedicated the time to view your ad,rendering the rest the funnel

Reach Video Plays Second Video Plays

If your ad isn‚Äôt stopping scrolls,that points toward the following:

Thumbnail isn‚Äôt effective First 3 seconds of the video sucks The offer isn‚Äôt relevant to the audience

STEP 2 :

Is your thumbnail effective?

usually, we will test at least 5‚Äì10 thumbnails in order to determine this,butif you haven‚Äôt conducted an A/B test, here is how you can be more certain that the thumbnails is ineffective

RELEVANT MATRICS:

Reach Video plays 3-second video plays Thumb effectiveness

FORMULA:

3-second video/video plays=Effectiveness%

Anything below 35% is not as optimized as it should be,and it will most likely prove inferior in stopping the scrolls.

THIS DOSEN‚ÄôT MEAN IT WON‚ÄôT GENERATE SALES, IT JUST MEANS IT COULD DO BETTER!

Sure! Here‚Äôs a draft of your article on how to grow on Instagram in 2022, keeping it under 500 words:

---

**How to Grow on Instagram in 2022**

Growing your presence on Instagram can be a challenging but rewarding endeavor. In 2022, with the platform‚Äôs continued evolution and the rise of new features, it‚Äôs crucial to stay ahead of the curve. Here are some key strategies to help you build a strong following and engage with your audience effectively.

**1. Consistency is Key**
Consistency is the backbone of any successful Instagram strategy. Regularly posting content, whether it‚Äôs photos, videos, or stories, helps keep your audience engaged and coming back for more. Aim to post at least once a day, but don‚Äôt overdo it. Quality over quantity is the mantra here.

**2. Know Your Audience**
Understanding your target audience is essential. Tailor your content to their interests and preferences. Use Instagram Insights to gather data on your audience‚Äôs demographics, interests, and behavior. This information can guide your content creation and help you reach a wider audience.

**3. Engage with Your Followers**
Engagement is crucial for building a loyal following. Respond to comments and messages promptly. Engage with other users by liking, commenting, and sharing their content. This not only boosts your own engagement but also helps you connect with new followers.

**4. Use Hashtags Strategically**
Hashtags are a powerful tool for increasing visibility. Use a mix of popular and niche hashtags to reach a broader audience. Research trending hashtags and use them in your posts. However, avoid overusing hashtags as it can look spammy.

**5. Leverage Instagram Stories and Reels**
Instagram Stories and Reels are great for creating short, engaging content. Use these features to share behind-the-scenes content, sneak peeks, and interactive polls. Stories and Reels can also be used to promote your posts and increase engagement.

**6. Collaborate with Influencers**
Collaborating with influencers can help you reach a wider audience. Look for influencers in your niche who have a similar audience to yours. Work together on content, giveaways, or shoutouts. This can help you tap into their existing followers and build your own following.

**7. Utilize Instagram Ads**
Instagram Ads can be a cost-effective way to grow your following. Use targeted ads to reach new audiences and promote your content. Consider running ads for your profile, posts, or stories to increase visibility and engagement.

**8. Stay Updated with Platform Changes**
Instagram is constantly evolving, so it‚Äôs important to stay updated with the latest features and changes. Follow the Instagram Blog and the Instagram Help Center for the latest updates. This will help you adapt your strategy as the platform evolves.

**Conclusion**
Growing on Instagram requires consistency, engagement, and strategic use of the platform‚Äôs features. By following these tips, you can build a strong following and engage with your audience effectively. Remember, the key is to be authentic and consistent in your content. Consistency is the most important factor in growing your presence on Instagram.

---

**Closing Tip: Consistency is Your Friend**
Consistency is the cornerstone of any successful Instagram strategy. Whether it‚Äôs posting regularly, engaging with your audience, or using the platform‚Äôs features effectively, consistency will help you build a loyal following and achieve your goals. Keep posting, keep engaging, and keep growing!
</response>

**'Repossession': A Horror Film That Mirrors *Get Out* and *Parasite* with Social Critique**

In the chilling world of 'Repossession,' director Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard have crafted a horror film that not only captivates with its suspenseful plot but also serves as a powerful social critique. Set in a near-future where class tensions and materialism are at an all-time high, the film mirrors the themes of *Get Out* and *Parasite* in a way that is both terrifying and thought-provoking.

The story follows a young woman who, after inheriting a large sum of money, finds herself entangled in a web of deceit and manipulation. As she navigates the treacherous landscape of her new wealth, she uncovers a sinister plot that threatens to tear her family apart. The film masterfully explores the dark underbelly of materialism and the dangers of unchecked greed, much like *Get Out* did with race relations and *Parasite* with class dynamics.

The film's festival buzz is already building, with critics praising its innovative approach and strong performances. The directors, Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, bring a unique perspective to the horror genre, combining their backgrounds in both film and theater to create a compelling narrative that resonates with audiences.

'Repossession' is set to release on December 2021, and will be distributed by Gravitas Ventures. With its compelling premise, strong cast, and critical acclaim, the film is sure to generate a lot of buzz in the horror community.

gts:
Repossession, produced, written and directed by Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, will see a North America release via Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021. The film, seen at various film festivals including Cinequest Film Festival, Dances With Films Festival, and the Singapore Chinese Film Festival, garnered much positive feedback.

Video Credit: Film Threat

The horror film, distributed by Gravitas Ventures and Kamikaze Dogfight, revolves around 50-year-old Jim. Jim has managed to construct for himself a perfect life in the world‚Äôs most expensive city. Curiously, when Jim is unexpectedly laid off, he desperately clings onto the symbols of his success. Not long thereafter, plauged by his past, we find Jim wrestling with resurfacing demons.

Repossession, frequently compared to Jordan Peele‚Äôs Get Out (2017) and Bong Joon Ho‚Äôs Parasite (2019), stars Gerald Chew as Jim. Chew‚Äôs previous work includes The Tattooist (2007), Apprentice (2016), and Wonder Boy (2017). More recently, playing Tommy ‚ÄòThe Scorpion‚Äô Chow, the actor could be seen in the Dean Devlin/Gary Rosen co-created television series Almost Paradise.

Video Credit: Cinequest

Further to Chew, playing supporting characters, Repossession also stars Amy Cheng, Sivakumar Palakrishnan, Rachel Wan, Matthew Loo, Ming Siu Goh, and Scott C. Hillyard. Repossession, with Siang Seng Goh, Alex Low and Mun Yang Tham serving as co-producers, comes to Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021.

Sure, here‚Äôs a draft for your article on competitive research for validating a niche:

---

**Competitive Research for Validating a Niche**

In today's competitive landscape, validating a niche within a niche requires a thorough understanding of both the demand and supply dynamics. By conducting competitive research, you can identify gaps in the market and uncover opportunities to differentiate your product or service.

**Demand Analysis**

To determine the demand for your niche, start by researching the current market trends and customer needs. Analyze data from industry reports, surveys, and social media to understand the size of the potential market and the preferences of your target audience. This will help you gauge the demand for your product or service within the niche.

**Supply Analysis**

Next, conduct a supply analysis to assess the competition and identify potential barriers to entry. Look at the existing offerings in your niche and evaluate their strengths and weaknesses. Consider factors such as pricing, quality, and customer service. This will help you understand the competitive landscape and the challenges you might face in establishing your niche.

**Finding a Niche Within a Niche**

Once you have a clear understanding of the demand and supply dynamics, you can start identifying a niche within your niche. Look for areas where there is a high demand but limited competition. For example, if your niche is in eco-friendly products, you might find that there is a growing demand for sustainable fashion but not many established brands in this sub-niche. By focusing on this sub-niche, you can differentiate your product or service and capture a larger share of the market.

In conclusion, conducting competitive research is crucial for validating a niche within a niche. By analyzing both the demand and supply dynamics, you can identify opportunities and set yourself apart from the competition. Remember to stay informed about market trends and continuously adapt your strategy to stay ahead.

---

I hope this helps! Let me know if you need any further adjustments.

gts:
Photo by Canva Studio from Pexels

Digital enterprises or online businesses are not bound by geography or stringent local regulations.

This makes it easier to start a business but it doesn‚Äôt make running the business any easier. Competition is fierce in almost every niche. Whatever your niche is, you should validate it by researching your competition. Let us explain how you should go about this and also why.

Step 1: Demand and Supply

The essence of most businesses can be boiled down to one reality, demand and supply.

If there is enough demand then you can cater to the supply. If there isn‚Äôt enough demand, then catering to supply doesn‚Äôt make any sense.

If there is only one diner in a locality, then it is likely to do well. If there are too many diners and not many people to fill up all those places, then most of those enterprises will run out of business.

Likewise, a digital enterprise or any online niche must have enough demand for there to be space to exist. While firms or endeavours can always coexist, the pie gets smaller and there is just less in it for everyone. The hard reality is that if there are enough players in a niche already and some of them have already amassed a massive market share, then penetrating their share or usurping a chunk of it will be a herculean task.

Study your competition to find out how large a market is and if some of your competitors are already catering to the needs of the audience. If you intend to do the same thing in the same niche, then there is little or no possibility for your enterprise to find a foothold, let aside being a roaring success.

Step 2: Niche within a Niche!

It is unlikely that the niche you have planned to target will be completely void of competition. There may be stiff or less competition. If there are players already with humongous market shares and dedicated customers or audiences, then you need to find a niche within a niche. You cannot cater to the same exact niche that your competition is committed to.

For instance, if you are planning to target the niche of food, cuisine or anything culinary, then you can find some subset that the existing players have not touched upon yet. If that is not possible, then you must figure out what you are best at and use that authority to create a niche within a niche.

It is all about the value you can offer to your audience and how you help, change or enrich their lives.

### What Are 3D Printers?

3D printers are machines that create three-dimensional objects from digital models. They work by depositing material, layer by layer, to build up the object. This technology has revolutionized manufacturing and is used in various industries.

### How Do 3D Printers Work?

1. **Design**: You create a digital model of the object you want to print using software like AutoCAD, Blender, or a 3D modeling app.
2. **Slicing**: The software slices the 3D model into thin layers and converts it into a series of instructions that the printer can follow.
3. **Printing**: The printer then extrudes material (like plastic, metal, or resin) in thin layers, building the object layer by layer.

### Common Uses of 3D Printers

1. **Healthcare**: 3D printers are used to create custom prosthetics, dental implants, and surgical models. They can also print human organs for research.
2. **Education**: Schools and universities use 3D printers to create models of complex structures, allowing students to visualize and understand concepts better.
3. **Aerospace**: Companies use 3D printers to create prototypes and small parts for aircraft, reducing the need for expensive molds.
4. **Automotive**: 3D printers are used to create prototypes and small components for cars, saving time and money.
5. **Architecture**: Architects use 3D printers to create detailed models of buildings, helping clients visualize the final design.

3D printers are versatile and can be used in many other fields as well. They are becoming increasingly accessible, making it easier for businesses and individuals to take advantage of this technology.
</response>

Sure! Here‚Äôs a draft for a short article on blockchain and cryptocurrencies in India, focusing on the benefits for public services like land record management and welfare distribution:

---

**Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies in India: Beyond Criminals to Transparency and Efficiency**

Blockchain technology, often misunderstood as a tool for criminals, is increasingly being recognized for its potential to revolutionize various sectors, including public services in India. One of the most promising applications of blockchain in India is in the realm of land record management and welfare distribution. By leveraging blockchain, these systems can significantly enhance transparency and reduce corruption.

**Land Record Management**

Land records are a critical aspect of public administration, and their accuracy is crucial for property transactions, tax collection, and legal disputes. Traditional land record systems are prone to errors and fraud, which can lead to disputes and inefficiencies. Blockchain technology can provide a tamper-proof and transparent ledger for land records. Each transaction, such as the transfer of land ownership or the registration of a property, can be recorded on a blockchain, ensuring that all changes are immutable and verifiable. This not only prevents fraud but also ensures that all parties involved have access to the most up-to-date and accurate information.

**Welfare Distribution**

Welfare schemes in India, such as the National Food Security Act (NFSA) and the Mid-Day Meal Scheme, are often plagued by corruption and inefficiency. Blockchain can help streamline these schemes by providing a secure and transparent platform for distributing benefits. For example, the government can use blockchain to create a digital identity for beneficiaries, ensuring that each person receives the correct amount of food or other benefits. This can be done by recording each transaction on a blockchain, which can be accessed by authorized officials and beneficiaries. This transparency can help reduce fraud and ensure that resources are used effectively.

**Reducing Corruption**

Blockchain technology can also help reduce corruption in government schemes by providing a transparent and auditable system. By recording all transactions on a blockchain, it becomes much harder for officials to manipulate data or divert funds. This can help build trust in government programs and ensure that resources are used for their intended purpose. Additionally, blockchain can be used to create smart contracts, which are self-executing contracts with the terms of the agreement directly written into code. This can help automate certain processes and reduce the need for intermediaries, further reducing the risk of corruption.

In conclusion, while blockchain is often associated with criminal activities, it has the potential to transform public services in India by enhancing transparency and reducing corruption. By implementing blockchain in land record management and welfare distribution, the government can create a more efficient and trustworthy system that benefits all citizens.

---

This article should provide a clear and concise overview of how blockchain can be used to improve public services in India, addressing the user's request for examples and benefits.
</response>
gts:
But but blockchain is for criminals‚Ä¶

Too many times have we heard this argument. It is almost a meme by now. It is a bit true, but also a lot wrong. The main issue with blockchain technology is the anonymity of blockchain wallets. Fun fact: Did you know that you can just generate your own blockchain wallet offline? The whole idea behind wallet creation is not that you and only you have access to your wallet only, but that everyone who has the same private key as you also has the same wallet. The ‚Äúsecurity‚Äù only stems from one aspect: Stochastics! Two people have a very very low chance to create the same wallet. For example, MetaMask creates them using 2048 seed words. In total, you need 12 of them to create a wallet. Therefore, there are 204‚Å∏¬π¬≤ possibilities. Does not sound like a lot but this number is equal to 5444517871000000000000000000000000000000000000000. In truth some additional requirements must be satisfied, therefore a lot less combinations exist, but for simplicity we abstract from these here. All of these wallets are therefore entirely anonymous. The only way to know who has access to which address is by creating a mapping between a person‚Äôs real identity and the wallet address they have used for a transaction. Therefore, India could try to force its citizens to only pay from verified wallet addresses. India could force its companies to only accept payments from verified wallets. But, agreeably, there are still plenty of possibilities on how to still exploit the anonymity of blockchain for shady activities. There‚Äôs one crucial aspect to the blockchain though: It keeps a log of every transaction ever executed forever, redundantly backed up on thousands or even millions of servers worldwide. Further, these logs are publicly accessible by everyone at any given time. Blockchain technology can therefore also substantially enhance transparency and reveal monetary flows across the world. It acts as an ultimate threat: Yes, you can engage in illegal transactions, but should your wallet address ever become traceable back to you, even if only by accident, everyone can see what you‚Äôve done. Therefore, India should not ban ‚Äúprivate‚Äù (i.e.. ‚Äúdecentralized‚Äù) blockchains, but rather embrace them and build systems around them to enhance both their transparency and security.

**How to Care for Loc Styles: Maintenance Tips, Product Recommendations, and Routine Care**

Caring for loc styles requires a thoughtful approach to ensure your hair remains healthy and well-groomed. Whether you have dreadlocks or sister locs, maintaining a consistent routine and using the right products can make a significant difference. In this article, we‚Äôll cover essential maintenance tips, product recommendations, and a routine care plan to help you achieve and maintain beautiful locs.

### Maintenance Tips

1. **Regular Brushing**: Use a wide-toothed comb to gently brush your locs every day. This helps to remove tangles and prevent breakage.
2. **Co-washing**: Incorporate co-washing into your routine to cleanse your hair without stripping it of natural oils. Apply a moisturizing shampoo to your locs, massage it in, and rinse thoroughly.
3. **Deep Conditioning**: Deep condition your locs every 2-3 weeks to replenish moisture and prevent dryness. Use a hydrating conditioner and leave it on for at least 15 minutes before rinsing.
4. **Towel-Drying**: Gently pat your locs dry with a soft towel to avoid excessive friction that can cause breakage. Avoid rubbing vigorously.

### Product Recommendations

1. **Shampoo**: Opt for sulfate-free and creamy shampoos to gently cleanse your locs without stripping natural oils. Brands like **Locs of Glory Spa and Salon** offer excellent options.
2. **Conditioner**: Use a hydrating conditioner to nourish your locs and prevent dryness. **Locs of Glory Spa and Salon** also provides high-quality conditioners.
3. **Co-washing Shampoo**: For co-washing, consider using a sulfate-free shampoo that is gentle on your hair. **Locs of Glory Spa and Salon** has a great co-washing shampoo that is perfect for locs.
4. **Deep Conditioner**: To deeply moisturize your locs, use a hydrating conditioner. **Locs of Glory Spa and Salon** offers a luxurious deep conditioner that will leave your hair feeling soft and silky.
5. **Oil**: Apply a small amount of **jojoba oil** or **shea butter** to your locs every few days to keep them moisturized and prevent tangling. These oils are great for maintaining the health of your locs.

### Routine Care Plan

1. **Daily Care**: Start your day by gently brushing your locs to remove any tangles. Use a hydrating shampoo and conditioner to cleanse and nourish your hair.
2. **Weekly Care**: Deep condition your locs every 2-3 weeks to replenish moisture and prevent dryness. Use a hydrating conditioner and leave it on for at least 15 minutes before rinsing.
3. **Monthly Care**: Visit a professional stylist at **Locs of Glory Spa and Salon** for a deep conditioning treatment and styling session. They can provide expert advice and help you achieve the best results for your locs.

By following these maintenance tips, product recommendations, and routine care plan, you can ensure that your locs remain healthy, well-groomed, and beautiful. Remember to be patient and consistent in your care routine, and your locs will thank you!

---

For more information and to learn about the specific products used, visit **Locs of Glory Spa and Salon**.
</response>

References and Reviews

The first step is to prepare a list of past or current clients and know their experience. If you don‚Äôt want to get in touch with clients directly, do a little research. Attention to Detail

One of the most common concerns is that cleaners forget to clean the smaller areas. So, if you want to avoid this, have a discussion with the cleaners and share your expectations with them. Ask if they clean all areas, like corners, under desks, cobwebs and crumbs. Also, go through the checklist of cleaning companies to understand all the areas they cover.

A Knowledgeable Cleaner and Cleaning Process

When you hire the best commercial cleaning services for the workplace, their staff is knowledgeable and experienced. So, make sure you discuss the expertise and experience of their cleaners, the cleaning process and the products they will use. Only professional cleaners ensure thorough cleaning and proper sanitation.

Budget-Friendly Services

Wrapping Up

MedlinePlus Genetics ‚Äî summary generated by Brevi Assistant

Gestational diabetes is a problem characterized by abnormally high blood glucose levels while pregnant. Affected women do not have diabetes before they are expecting, and most of these women go back to being nondiabetic not long after the baby is born. Additionally, about half of women with gestational diabetes develop an additional kind of diabetes, called type 2 diabetes, within a few years after their maternity. Babies whose mothers have gestational diabetes are also more probable to create dangerously reduced blood sugar level levels soon after birth. Laron disorder is an uncommon type of short stature that results from the body‚Äôs inability to make use of development hormonal agent, a substance generated by the brain‚Äôs pituitary gland that assists advertise growth. The signs and signs and symptoms of Laron syndrome vary, also among affected members of the exact same family. Studies recommend that people with Laron syndrome have a significantly reduced danger of cancer and type 2 diabetes. Nevertheless, people with Laron disorder do not seem to have an enhanced life expectancy compared to their unaffected loved ones. Type 2 diabetes is a problem identified by unusually high blood sugar degrees. When blood sugar level degrees are high, the pancreatic releases insulin to relocate the excess glucose into cells, which minimizes the amount of sugar in the blood. The majority of people who establish type 2 diabetes first have insulin resistance, a condition in which the body‚Äôs cells make use of insulin less effectively than typical. Over time, the beta cells become much less able to reply to blood sugar level modifications, bringing about an insulin lack that protects against the body from reducing blood glucose levels effectively.

The Rubbish Project is a company on a mission to create a waste-free world by providing circular economy solutions to the planet‚Äôs messiest problem, Rubbish.

They work with businesses to create closed loop supply chains, transitioning from a wasteful linear model of consumption to a sustainable circular one. They bring products and systems to market which make true environmental sense by considering the entire lifecycle of the product, and the material that it‚Äôs made from.

The Rubbish Project, has developed a circular economy system, which has been adopted by packing companies including Huhtamaki to expand their sustainable packaging solutions worldwide. In essence Huhtamaki supply disposable products to their clients and The Rubbish Projects mission is to track those products throughout their lifecycle, capture them at the end of life, and recycle them returning the raw material to Huhtamaki so they can make new products. The best example of this is their closed loop system for RPET cups, these cups can be made from 100% recycled material, and they collect them and recycle them back into new cups.

$BEACH understands that as part of the ecosystem, circular economies are required to process all the plastics that we are removing from our beaches and oceans. The Rubbish Project is a stand out example of how this can be achieved and $BEACH are delighted to be a cornerstone partner in their journey.

If you currently live in India and are looking to invest in reAlpha, we have good news for you. We‚Äôve put together this blog post detailing exactly how to invest in reAlpha from India ‚Äî complete with all of the steps you need to take in order to transfer your funds successfully.

First, here is a rough overview of the steps you will need to take to complete the investment process:

Sign the subscriber agreement on the Dealmaker portal under ‚ÄúGlobal Investors.‚Äù Select ‚Äúwire transfer‚Äù as the payment method. Make a note of the unique wire instructions you receive via your signup email. Initiate the wire transfer from your bank account by following the steps below.

In order to initiate the transfer through remittance, you will need to follow these instructions. (Please note that this will be a capital account transaction.)

Log into your bank account. Click on ‚Äúpay and transfer‚Äù or ‚Äúpayments.‚Äù Choose the account from which you want to pay. Select ‚Äúinternational beneficiary account‚Äù or ‚Äúadd beneficiary.‚Äù Please note that you must fill in the full address of the beneficiary. Type in the amount you would like to invest in USD. (You can find a helpful currency converter here.) Please note, the minimum investment amount is $1,000 USD. Select the appropriate dropdown for charges and choose ‚ÄúPortfolio Investment in Equity Shares‚Äù or a similar option. The purpose of remittance can be ‚ÄúInvestment abroad in equities/equity shares,‚Äù ‚ÄúPortfolio Investment Abroad ‚Äî in Equities,‚Äù or ‚ÄúOverseas investment in equity shares.‚Äù Fill out the beneficiary reference field based on the guidelines you received in your wire instructions email that you made note of in step 3. Read and accept the declaration. Click continue. Accept the terms and conditions. Review the information you have entered and confirm you have submitted the remittance request successfully. Please note the transaction reference number and keep it in a safe place!

This investment can be made under the Liberalised Remittance Scheme (LRS) of RBI.
